about_the_game:
JRPG With TRPG Elements


Inspired by GameBook, each scene is presented as a hand-drawn map.
A simple TRPG skill check mechanic adds an extra layer of fun and challenge to the adventure.


Challenging Themed Levels


You can travel through magical forests to freezing mountain peaks. Explore a variety of landscapes and handle diverse challenges.
Gather clues, use your wits to solve puzzles, and make the right choice to conquer the trials ahead.


Classic Turn-Based Combat


Battle against dozens of monsters, each with their own unique qualities, delivering an exciting combat experience.
The combination of allies, skills, and weapons — as well as careful observation of monster behavior — is the key to victory.


Companions to Enrich Your Journey


Meet and recruit a diverse cast of companions, each with their own abilities and personalities.
They'll support you on your adventure. As you grow closer, you can uncover their hidden pasts.


Replayability in New Game+


The protagonist has four distinct origins to choose from, offering different perspectives and experiences to piece together the full story.
Some content can only be unlocked in New Game+, with plenty of hidden details and Easter eggs waiting to be discovered.

What's New in the Remastered Edition


- New levels with added interactive content and branching events, while maintaining the core storyline.
- A new ability system with more options for combos and strategies.
- Improved accessibility and gameplay from the original game, with new features like auto-save, an encyclopedia, and achievements.
- Expanded lore and more interactions with companions.
- A fully upgraded UI.
- Enhanced level and battle cutscenes.
- The original art has been remastered in HD, and new visuals have been added for a more immersive experience.
- Multi-language support and full controller compatibility.

short_description: In a quiet corner of a small town by the river, ancient ruins have mysteriously reappeared. Within lies a sprawling labyrinth filled with cryptic prophecies that have drawn in adventurers from far and wide. But alongside the legendary monsters and treasures, many more secrets remain hidden...
